name: Lagoreatory 7D
description:
Welcome mortal,

Your soul will be inserted in a laboratory full of double trunked elephants with two pistols each. It's your job to make them pay for being the only type of enemy in your path.

* Immerse yourself in a double world, where elephants have two trunks instead of the standard one trunk that they have and use as their arm basically. Almost like people! But these elephants can also carry weapons in their hands.

* Pick up several things.
